channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- NuGetGallery
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- NuGetGallery

item.title: CVE-2020-1340|2024-08-04T06:32:00.748Z -- microsoft -- nugetgallery
item.description: A spoofing vulnerability exists when the NuGetGallery does not properly sanitize input on package metadata values, aka 'NuGetGallery Spoofing Vulnerability'.
